title: cant find my mystery chest?
body: Well i just cant find my mystery chest after i just did buy one for 790 RP, some one can help?

replies.body: If you goto the store and click on the Skins sub-section, you can find both of the mystery chests in there. No worries, little hard to find this time around.

I am having the same exact issue. I can see where to buy them, but I think the question is where does it appear AFTER you buy them. I bought a mystery chest and it said I received it, BUT WHERE IS IT?!?!?!!
Nevermind, I just had to close the client and then open it up again.
